name: 6AM
description:
Overworked and underpaid - another late night at the office turns into a living nightmare. Can you make it out alive?

[  Platforms ]
- Windows
- Mac
- Linux

[ Minimum Specs ]
- 2GB RAM
- 1.10 GHz Processor

[ Recommended Specs ]
- 4GB RAM (or higher)
- 2 GHz Processor (or higher)

[Disk Space ]
300 MB
